name: Backshot (Escada Games)
description:
Backshot Just dodge everything orange

 Another small game. Made for the Trijam #155, as another attempt to get out of my current gamedev rut.

 Controls:
  • Arrow keys: move;
  • X: shoot;
  • R: restart.
Credits/Software used:
  • Godot Engine v3.4.2;
  • JFXR;
  • Deflemask;
  • Coolors.co.
